title: M-01 Mandated Intent Schema (v94.1)
description: Defines the mandatory schema for all M-01 Intent submissions before ingestion. Ensures structural integrity, cryptographic signature provenance, required metadata, and mandates adherence to Mandate Version v94.1 governance standards.

mandate_version.description: The specific governance version this intent adheres to.

intent_id.description: Unique UUID cryptographic identifier for this intent mandate (M-01).

target_architecture_scope.description: List of internal system file paths or architectural components targeted for evolution (must start with standard root directories).

payload_hash_signature.description: Cryptographic signature (e.g., SHA-512 hex hash) proving the provenance and integrity of the associated change payload (M-02). Must be a 128-character hex string.

change_rationale.description: Detailed, auditable reasoning justifying the evolutionary step. Minimum 100 characters.

resource_cap_proposal.description: Initial proposal for resource ceilings required for Stage 3 execution (RACM input). Resources must be non-negative.

governance_stakeholder_signature.description: Authentication signature (e.g., Base64 encoded ECC signature) from the authorizing subsystem or component.
